casebody.data:
MAGYAR SAVINGS BANK, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Carol A. MICHAELS a/k/a Carol Colucci, Carol Colucci Michaels, Defendant,
and
John T. Michaels, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
State of New Jersey and Ashbrook Care and Rehabilitation Center LLC, Defendants. C-588 September Term, 2017
078868 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000143-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
